about_the_game:
You are a young woman passionate about the paranormal, in search of the truth behind inexplicable phenomena. On one of your trips, you discover an ancient abandoned village, dominated by a majestic castle whose history has been shrouded in mystery and silence. The villagers warn you: no one knows what happened within those walls, but one night, everything mysteriously fell into oblivion.

Ignoring the warnings, you persuade a local to take you to the castle under the cover of night, ensuring your incursion remains secret.

Armed only with your hands and a torch, you will enter a vast, dark forest, traverse the corridors of an abandoned villa, and explore the dungeons where the most atrocious acts in history were committed.

Face a variety of puzzles, from the simplest to the most complex, that will test your wit and determination.

Prepare for chilling encounters with paranormal beings and monsters lurking around every corner, waiting for someone with enough courage to cross into their domains.

Each step will take you deeper into the darkness. Advance through dark and eerie labyrinths.

Your journey will not be easy. Paranormal horrors and monstrous creatures will always be lurking, ready to capture you. And remember, you will never truly be alone; something or someone will always be following your steps, watching your every move.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains explicit depictions of violence and torture reflecting the brutalities of the medieval era. Players will encounter graphic scenes including:

Tortures and executions that were common during the Middle Ages.
Monsters and hostile creatures seeking to harm the protagonist.
Dark and terrifying environments designed to create an atmosphere of suspense and horror.
The game does not contain depictions of sexual abuse, non-consensual sex, drug and alcohol abuse, or self-harm. However, the intense violence and dark themes may be disturbing to some players.

Discretion is advised while playing, especially for those sensitive to themes of extreme violence and psychological horror.

detailed_description:
You are a young woman passionate about the paranormal, in search of the truth behind inexplicable phenomena. On one of your trips, you discover an ancient abandoned village, dominated by a majestic castle whose history has been shrouded in mystery and silence. The villagers warn you: no one knows what happened within those walls, but one night, everything mysteriously fell into oblivion.

Ignoring the warnings, you persuade a local to take you to the castle under the cover of night, ensuring your incursion remains secret.

Armed only with your hands and a torch, you will enter a vast, dark forest, traverse the corridors of an abandoned villa, and explore the dungeons where the most atrocious acts in history were committed.

Face a variety of puzzles, from the simplest to the most complex, that will test your wit and determination.

Prepare for chilling encounters with paranormal beings and monsters lurking around every corner, waiting for someone with enough courage to cross into their domains.

Each step will take you deeper into the darkness. Advance through dark and eerie labyrinths.

Your journey will not be easy. Paranormal horrors and monstrous creatures will always be lurking, ready to capture you. And remember, you will never truly be alone; something or someone will always be following your steps, watching your every move.
name: Medieval Nightt - Part 1

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3225; AMD Ryzen 3 3250U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000 en PC; AMD Radeon Vega 8
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible
  • Additional Notes: With these specifications, it is recommended to play the game on low quality settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64 bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7300U; AMD Ryzen 3 3300U
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960, AMD R9 280 or equivalent GPU (compatible with DX11)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DX11 compatible

short_description: Medieval Nightt is a first-person horror game where, as a young adventurer, you explore an ancient medieval empire in ruins, facing restless spirits and paranormal creatures while unraveling the dark secrets of a lost civilization.
